description: The Correctional Service Canada (SCC) desire feedback on Counter Uncrewed Aerial Systems (C-UAS) technology
tags: Untomanned Aircraft Systems Request for Information
full_summary:
### Counter-Uncrewed Aerial System (C-UAS) Technology Request for Information

#### Notice Number: 21120-23-4416240

#### Posting Date: June 6, 2023
#### Closing Date: July 4, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) invites industry feedback on Counter-Uncrewed Aerial System (C-UAS) technology. The CSC seeks to inform industry of the forthcoming requirement, identify solutions, and obtain feedback on the draft statement of work.

#### Background
Uncrewed aerial systems (UAS) also known as drones, are becoming increasingly common in various industries. CUC markets alternative UAS-based solutions for C-UAS capabilities. CUC is not conducting a procurement at this time, but it is gathering information to inform future procurement activities.

#### Key Objectives
- To gather industry feedback on the draft statement of work
- To identify solutions and potential approaches to meet CSC's requirements
- To assist in the development of a future procurement RFP

This is a non-mandatory request for information (RFI) from potential suppliers. All interested suppliers are encouraged to respond to this RFI. All responses must be provided in the original language or in English (if the original language is French).

#### Contact Information

- Diana Todorova, Contact Person: 343-552-1625, Diana.Todorova@ec-csc.ca
- For complete details, please visit Canada Buys website and access the attached files.

#### Files
- RFI Documents
- Annex A and B (Draft Statement of Work and Questions)
